Quickblade Scarper.name: Quickblade Scarper
Quickblade Scarper.flavor: Your surprising quickness makes it impossible to hit you solidly.
Quickblade Scarper.effect: You can shift your speed, and you take half damage from all attacks until the start of your next turn.

Slash and Dash.name: Slash and Dash
Slash and Dash.flavor: After delivering two sharp cuts, you scamper to a safe position.
Slash and Dash.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Slash and Dash.effect: If you have combat advantage against every target of the attack, you can shift your speed and must end in a space that is not adjacent to a target of the attack.

Quickblade Form.name: Quickblade Form
Quickblade Form.flavor: You move quickly, with your dagger poised to retaliate.
Quickblade Form.effect: When an adjacent enemy makes an opportunity attack against you, you can make a melee basic attack with a light blade against that enemy as a free action. Until the stance ends, you can make this attack only once per round.
